Package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.utils

Class Ping

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.utils.Ping
public abstract class Ping
extends java.lang.Object
How to ping a host to test for (ICMP) network connectivity.
Author:
Donal Fellows

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static int ping​(java.lang.String address)
    Pings to detect if a host or IP address is reachable.
    static int ping​(java.net.InetAddress address)
    Pings to detect if a host or IP address is reachable.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • ping

      public static int ping​(java.lang.String address)
      Pings to detect if a host or IP address is reachable. May wait for up to about five seconds (or longer in extremis). Technically, it only detects if a host is reachable by ICMP ECHO requests.
      Parameters:
      address - Where should be pinged.
      Returns:
      0 on success, other values on failure (reflecting the result of the OS subprocess).

    • ping

      public static int ping​(java.net.InetAddress address)
      Pings to detect if a host or IP address is reachable. May wait for up to about five seconds (or longer in extremis). Technically, it only detects if a host is reachable by ICMP ECHO requests.
      Parameters:
      address - Where should be pinged.
      Returns:
      0 on success, other values on failure (reflecting the result of the OS subprocess).
